description: Lightly indulgent and sweet, these pancakes are a filling start to the day.
name: Chia Seed Pancakes with Dark Chocolate Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the chia seeds in a bowl with the oat milk for 30 minutes in the fridge. In a mixing bowl, sift the flour, baking powder and sugar together.
While mixing, combine the vanilla, and oat milk mixture and chocolate pieces in and mix until combine fully with no lumps.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat with the coconut oil and pour some of the contents onto the pan. Amount depends on the size pancakes you want.
Allow to fry for 4 minutes until bubbles start to appear, then carefully flip over and cook the other side for 3 minutes.
Remove from the heat and set to one side. Repeat process for the rest of the mixture and serve with fruit and agave syrup of desired.
